lead_paragraph: As Valeant Pharmaceuticals’ market value sinks, the company’s future may hinge on what it can get now for the companies it bought.

headline.main: Figuring Out What Valeant Is Really Worth

snippet: As Valeant Pharmaceuticals’ market value sinks, the company’s future may hinge on what it can get now for the companies it bought.
abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column addresses question of how to determine worth of Valeant Pharmaceuticals, in light of steep drop in company's shares; notes analysts have doubts about company's ability to raise cash, despite Pershing Square Capital Management William A Ackman's assurances.
